snippet.title: Trapped In Family Vacation - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
"Trapped In Family Vacation" is a short horror game in the genre of "walking simulator."
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3163730/Trapped_In_Family_Vacation/

Trapped in a small hotel, your only chance to escape is by completing a twisted game. Use your in-game phone to scan QR codes for past footage, then explore each room to find and mark all five differences from the footage. But beware—each room is occupied by a lunatic family member with unpredictable behaviors. Can you survive this vacation and uncover its dark secrets?

Average Play Time: 60 minutes
